annotation.div: This query provides a view of all patient data in the SanteDB system

definitions.add:
npgsql fbsql
select ent_id as id, dcsd_utc as death_time, mb_ord as multi_birth, dob as birth_time, gndr.mnemonic as gender, crt_utc as created_time, mrtl.mnemonic as marital_status, edu_lvl.mnemonic as edu_level from pat_tbl inner join psn_tbl using (ent_vrsn_id) inner join ent_vrsn_tbl using (ent_vrsn_id) inner join cd_vrsn_tbl gndr on (gndr_cd_id = gndr.cd_id and obslt_vrsn_seq_id is null) left join cd_vrsn_tbl mrtl on (mrtl_sts_cd_id = mrtl.cd_id .cd_id and obslt_vrsn_seq_id is null) left join cd_vrsn_tbl edu_lvl on (edu_lvl_cd_id = edu_lvl.cd_id and obslt_vrsn_seq_id is null) where obslt_utc is null and dob between coalesce(${dob-from}, '0001-01-01') and coalesce(${dob-to}, current_date) and gndr_cd_id = COALESCE(${gender}, gndr_cd_id);
